授業方法: This course will be conducted online through a balance of on-demand, independent learning and real-time synchronous Zoom sessions.   Students will read and analyze paragraphs and essays, and learn or review the grammar, language, and organizational features of academic writing.  Writing will be taught as a process with attention to pre-writing, multiple draft writing, and peer-review.

第3回: Comparison-contrast paragraph: diagramming and using comparatives (Zoom)
第8回: Problem / solution mini-essay:  feedback and student examples; essay revisions (on-demand)
第9回: Writing introductions and conclusions; outlining and essay organization (Zoom)
第10回: Integrating outside source material; opinion essay pre-writing activities (on-demand)
第11回: Complete the essay introduction and conclusion paragraphs
第13回: Opinion essay: writing workshop (format to be decided)
Make final revision to the complete opinion essay
第14回: End-of-semester activities: writing for pleasure (format to be decided)
